long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crappy Ad Swap is an extension that allows you to see good advertising instead of the bad advertising you usually find when you surf websites.
 
This extension has an educative purpose and is exclusive for Brotherâ€™s students, so you need a code to install it.

Ask at your Brother base for it!

This extension does:

-    Swap all banner formats.
-    Swap Google Adsense
-    Hide spam
